Windlord:

Windlord knew that Rodimus would kill himself trying to safe 
Ngithlight "I have to stop him...."thought the male and shout "THOSE 
ARE FOR RODIMUS AND NIGHTLIGHT!!!! " 

An shot two feather missiles against Kitkat and Destructor and he 
flew after that to Rodimus's location while he opened his com link 
and said "RODIMUS YOU HAVE TO STOP!!!! IF YOU GO THERE WITHOUT A 
PLAN HYDRAS COULD KILL YOU AND NIGHTLIGHT WOULD BE LOST!!!! WE HAVE 
TO HAVE A PLAN!!!!"




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> 
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> Rodimus hears Yggdrasil over the comm, but at first he has no 
intention of listening. However the mention of his daughter makes 
him stop in his tracks.
> Rodimus collapses on the battlefield, his comm channel open.
> Rodimus Prime: I k..know Yggdrasil, but I h..have t..to help her. 
I c..cant leave her there. S..shes my family. I l..love h..her...
> Rodimus had been reduced to an emotinal wreck by this point. 
Anger, hatred, love, loss, it was all to much for him. At this time 
Rodimus didn't seem like the strong Autobot and Maximal Commander, 
but more of a scared and confused child.
>  Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:Yggdrasil had heard the message, 
but he could not obey. Besides, he
> was as high ranking as Rodimus.

sake!
